text: Maria Helena Kaczyńska (; née Mackiewicz; 21 August 1942 – 10 April 2010) was the First Lady of Poland from 2005 through 2010. She was the wife of President Lech Kaczyński. On 10 April 2010, 10:41 MSD (06:41 UTC), Maria Kaczyńska, and her husband, Polish President Lech Kaczyński, died when the Polish Air Force Tupolev Tu-154M they were aboard crashed while attempting to land at Smolensk- North Airport in the Russian city of Smolensk. All 89 passengers on board and the 7 crew members were killed."Polish President, 95 Others Killed in Plane Crash ", VOA News, 10 April 2010, Retrieved 10 April 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== *Polish First Lady's official website *Maria Kaczyńska official biography (in English) Category:1942 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:First Ladies of Poland
title: Maria Kaczyńska
